sentences.english: My head would be high as the ninth heaven.
The bad situation is not good for the Heaven's Future Development. We must take measures.
sentences.chinese: 咱们现在这个状况，对天庭将来的发展很不利。

sentences.english: The Monkey King is a cartoon character who causes problems in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 美猴王是一个卡通角色，他在天庭上制造了很多麻烦。

sentences.english: Under that tree, the statue, twisting his fortitude handsome face, a wriggler.
sentences.chinese: 看老树下，那雕像，紧蹙双眉坚毅天庭俊朗。

sentences.english: I had lived in the heaven for a long time , and what up in Fruits hill.
sentences.chinese: 在天庭住好一阵子了，不知你在花果山过得可好？

sentences.english: Many believe it's also the best time for their prayers to be heard.
sentences.chinese: 许多人相信这是自己的诉求上达天庭的最佳时候。

sentences.english: Then the gate of life eternal may I enter, Lord, with Thee.
sentences.chinese: 当天上永生门大开，愿与主同进天庭。

sentences.english: I have stayed in the palace for a long time, how are you in Huaguo Mountain?
sentences.chinese: 在天庭住好一阵子了，不知你在花果山过得可好？

sentences.english: The Heaven God claimed that only when the gold beans were in blossom could the Dragon King return to the heaven palace.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝下令，只有当金豆开花之时才允许龙王返回天庭。

sentences.english: Gabriel is also traditionally known as the great communicator for the Divine.
sentences.chinese: 加百列也是传说中与天庭沟通的伟大沟通师。

sentences.english: I heard the celestial music from Heaven, which is crowning for you.
sentences.chinese: 我听到天庭鼓乐齐鸣，在为我的女儿加冕。

sentences.english: Give thanks to the God of heaven, his kindness endures forever!
sentences.chinese: 请众感谢天主上居天庭，因为他的仁慈永远常存。

sentences.english: Scattering contagious fire into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 遍布西班牙，荧火蔓延撒向天庭。

sentences.english: Sweet the rains' new fall sunlit from heaven.
sentences.chinese: 初下的雨水和来自天庭的阳光何等甜美。

sentences.english: I heard the celestial music form Heaven, which is crowning for you.
sentences.chinese: 我听到天庭鼓乐齐鸣，在为我的女儿加冕。

definition: lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
celestial troops and generals (idiom)/fig. superior forces
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
another name for 西王母[Xi1 wang2 mu3], Queen Mother of the West
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
